stories.original_headline: The deep ocean has a missing link and scientists finally found it
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered why big predators like sharks spend so much time in the oceanâ€™s twilight zone. The answer lies with mid-sized fish such as the bigscale pomfret, which live deep during the day and rise at night to feed, linking deep and surface food webs. Using satellite tags, researchers t
stories.fantasy_headline: Deep Sea Alchemists Uncover Twilight Zone's Hidden Feast Link
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Alchemists, using clever tracking enchantments, have finally solved a mystery of the deep sea realm. They discovered that shimmering finned beasts from the Murky Depths rise at night to feed, connecting the bountiful surface waters with the shadowy abyss. This discovery explains why great sea predators frequent these twilight waters.

stories.original_headline: Most distant supernova: James Webb sees a star explode at cosmic dawn
stories.original_summary: Scientists have detected the most distant supernova ever seen, exploding when the universe was less than a billion years old. The event was first signaled by a gamma-ray burst and later confirmed using the James Webb Space Telescope, which was able to isolate the blast from its faint host galaxy. Su
stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Wizards Witness Grand Star's Fiery Demise in Young Cosmos
stories.fantasy_story: Using the Grand Oracle's Far-Seeing Glass, the Celestial Wizards have witnessed the most ancient and grand star's fiery demise ever recorded. This magnificent explosion, first signaled by a powerful magical pulse, occurred when the cosmos was but a babe. It provides rare insights into the very dawn of creation.

stories.original_headline: Google Photos is coming to Samsung TVs in 2026
stories.original_summary: Google Photos will finally be available on TVs next year, starting with an upcoming integration for Samsung TVs. Samsung announced that the planned integration will "seamlessly bring the photos people capture on their phones to Samsung TVs, where they can appear in a larger, cinematic format," and t
stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Library of Images to Grace Samsung Scrying Mirrors
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Samsung Clan has announced a grand linking enchantment for their Vision Panels next year. Soon, the memories captured on personal Scrying Orbs can be viewed upon their magnificent enchanted mirrors. This will allow villagers to share their treasured images in a truly spectacular fashion.

stories.original_headline: LG announces new UltraGear evo gaming monitors with AI upscaling
stories.original_summary: LG unveiled a whole new line of gaming monitors ahead of CES on Friday. The UltraGear evo line are all high-end monitors covering a range of technologies, but united by 5K resolution and AI upscaling. The three flagships under the new branding are the 39GX950B, the 27GM950B, and the 52G930B. The fir
stories.fantasy_headline: LG Clan Unveils New Enchanted Battle Displays with Glimmerweave Magic
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned LG Clan has revealed a new collection of master-crafted Enchanted Battle Displays for upcoming tournaments. These magnificent vision panels boast powerful Glimmerweave enchantments, making every skirmish and quest appear remarkably vivid. Adventurers will find their trials of skill truly come to life.
